question:
Bantu nyusun kata-kata ne jadi klimat yg bner ya yang dimulai dri yg bergaris bawah sama bantu buatkan CONDITIONAL SENTENCE TIPE 2    arrange the jumbled words to form meaningful sentences,starting with the underlined words.
1. phone-puppet-his-invite-the-I-number-my-see-Finto-know-will-if-show-to-I-at-place
2. and-holiday-Bali-if-have-will-his-Lombok-long-go-year-Mr. Kukuh-family-to-they-and-this-a mohon di bantu

answers.answer:
1. If  I know his phone number, I will invite Finto to the puppet show at my place.
2. If Mr. Kukuh and his family go to Bali, they will have a long holiday to Lombok this year.
Sorry kalau salah, baru pemula hehehe

It's curious as we grow older, how easy it is to lose our sense of direction, a sense of vocation, a sense of God's calling us to important things still to be done. Vocations are not just for the young starting out in marriage, a career, or religious life. There's another kind of vocation — a kind of "late vocation" — God's final call to a strong finish. It is God's call to each one of us to grow old gracefully — full of grace — to grow toward Him. God calls us to respond heroically, like Saint Paul, pouring ourselves out like a libation until we can say: "I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith" (II Tm 7).


INI ?

related_questions.question:
Combine the sentences using : Too, so, or either and neither    1. Dogs can't eat vegetables. Cats can't eat vegetables
2. We haven't eaten yet. Father hasn't yet
3. Mitha is not seventeen years old. I am not seventeen years old

Jawabannya yang Jelas ya :)

answers.answer:
1. Dogs can't eat vegetables. Neither can cats
2. We haven't eaten yet. Father hasn't either
3. Mitha is not seventeen years old. I am not either

related_questions.question:
Tolong buatin dialog expresing anger :)
untuk 2 orang

answers.answer:
Everyone Has Bad Day
Sari : Hey, Rangga!
Rangga : What displeasure!
Sari : What? What happened, Rangga? Are you angry about something?
Rangga : Oh, I’m very sorry, Sari. I was walking near handkerchief. You can wipe up your wet shirt.
Rangga : Oh, thank you, Sari. So, how was your day, Sari? Did something bad happen to you too? Haha I’m kidding, Sari.
Sari : Actually, something bad did happen to me. It’s still driving me mad until now.
Rangga : Oh, really? What do you look so insulted about?
Sari : It’s my boss. He said that I can have a day-offs earlier but today he revoked what he said. I was planning on going for a vacation on my day-offs with my family. I am extremely displeased about that.
Rangga : I’m sorry to hear that.
Sari : Well, everyone has bad day but if we still consider it positively, everything is going to be alright
Rangga : Yeah, I think you’re right

related_questions.question: Tolong describe dengan tema "my beloved home"

answers.answer:
My beloved home

It is located in the central park. My home is the sweetest home on my complex. It has green roof which is made from special clay. Therefore it is always shining when the sun light rise in the morning.

my home.. my everything.. even my home not as huge the president home or a museums.. even my home don't as rich as the businessman home.. i love my home.. because my home protect me from the light of the sun , from the extreme weather , from the cold of the rain.. but i still love my home..home sweet home.. you're my protecter from childhood.. how bad you're you still my home... i called it my beloved home

related_questions.question:
Arrange to a good sentences !    1) realized - I - just - mistakes - had - we - made -
2) they - when - gone - arrived - had - we - already

answers.answer:
Maaf saya hanya bisa menyusun yang nomor 2, semoga membantu ya :)
2) We had already arrived when they gone.

1. "I realized mistakes we had made" (saya menyadari kesalahan-kesalahan yang telah kita buat), or "I realized we had made mistakes" (saya menyadari bahwa kita telah melakukan kesalahan-kesalahan).
2. "They had already gone when we arrived" (mereka telah pergi ketika kita tiba), or "We had alredy gone when they arrived" (kita telah pergi ketika mereka tiba).
if conditional sentences? beda tenses-nya, sama fact-nya

Type 1 = Real / Present Conditional (terjadi sekarang)
Form = If + S + V1..., I + will + V1...
Example = If I have money, I will treat you
Meaning = it may/ may not happen. Jadi artinya bisa terjadi atau tidak.

Type 2 = Contrary to the present fact (bertentangan sama yang terjadi pada kenyataan)
Form = If + S + V2..., I + would + V1...
Example =
a. If I had money, I would treat you
b. If I were you, I would leave him
Meaning =
a1. I don't have money, so I dont treat you, or
a2. I don't treat you, because I don't have money
b. I'm not you, so I don't leave him
(intinya kalau conditional 2, penyataan dalam v2, arti dalam v1)

Type 3
Form = If + S + had + V3..., I + would + have + V3...
Example =
a. If I had had money, I would have treated you
b. If my father had got marred again, my mother would have killed him
Meaning =
a. I didn't have money, so I didn't treat you
b. My father didn't get married again, so my mother didn't kill him
(intinya kalau conditional 3, penyataan dalam v3, arti dalam v2)

related_questions.question: Buat text hartatory explenation  yang berjudul effect of insomnia

answers.answer:
Effect of Insomnia
Horatory -> thesis -> reason -> suggestion

Insomnia is kind of illness that makes people hard to sleep. Due to its negative effect, this illness is categorized as the dangerous symptoms. The reason could be classified from Internal feelings of the person. Therefore if we have this illness, better to have consultation toward the doctor. We stand to benefit by the greater time of sleep that we have.
